bibl.title: An Astronomical Table Containing Jupiter's Synodic Phenomena.
bibl.note: The fragment comes from the same manuscript as P. Oxy. LXI, 4160 (in the course of publication). - Recto. Fragment of criminal court proceedings (?), mid to late first century A.D. - Verso: Astronomical table, late first century A.D.
bibl.seg: BRASHEAR William and Alexander JONES, An Astronomical Table Containing Jupiter's Synodic Phenomena.

The fragment comes from the same manuscript as P. Oxy. LXI, 4160 (in the course of publication). - Recto. Fragment of criminal court proceedings (?), mid to late first century A.D. - Verso: Astronomical table, late first century A.D.
